titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 515) to provide for more detailed and uniform disclosure by credit card issuers with respect to information on interest rates and other fees which may be incurred by consumers through the use of any credit card.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-403.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 217 - 198 (Record Vote No: 380).

bill.summary: 10/27/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 515 (credit card cost disclosure).
